name: Kick Ups
description: Play Kick Ups game online at Lagged.com. Kick Ups is one of our handpicked sports games that can be played on any device.
content: Kick Ups is a classic sports-themed game that never gets old! Test your reflexes and accuracy by trying to keep the soccer ball in the air for as long as possible. You can use different sides of your feet and even your knees to control the ball's movement. Challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score! With simple yet addictive gameplay and stunning visuals, Kick Ups is fun for everyone! Experience the excitement now!
howtoplay: How to play: Click or tap to kick the ball
introduce: Try to keep the ball in the air for as long as possible. Keep kicking the ball up in the air, if the ball hits the ground it is game over. Master both modes, normal and challenge modes in order to top the leaderboards and unlock all four achievements.

name: Tap Touch Run
description: Play Tap Touch Run game online at Lagged.com. Tap Touch Run is one of our handpicked skill games that can be played on any device.
content: Tap Touch Run is an exciting fast-paced running game for all ages! Control your character as they run, dodge and jump through a challenging, randomly generated obstacle course. Tap your screen to jump in order to avoid obstacles, collect coins and power-ups, and aim for high scores! Complete daily challenges and unlock cool power-ups as you progress. With its colorful graphics, energetic soundtrack and simple controls, Tap Touch Run is sure to keep you entertained and running through endless levels of endless fun!
howtoplay: How to play: Click or tap to rotate and jump. Jump as late as possible to clear gaps.
introduce: Tip: Jump as late as possible to clear gaps. Help your animal clear each level by safely getting to the finish line. A fast paced running game where you need to stay focused in order to complete each level. Try to help your animals finish all 18 skill based levels.
